question.title: Minecraft modding 1.21.10, fabric loom and gradle version mismatch(i think)
question.body:
distributionBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME
distributionPath=wrapper/dists
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-9.2.0-bin.zip
networkTimeout=10000
validateDistributionUrl=true
zipStoreBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME
zipStorePath=wrapper/dists

Just the basic template downloaded from the fabric website for 1.21.10, this is the first time i get this error, it worked from me for previous versions.

Error during build

Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/gradle/util/VersionNumber

if i downgrade gradle to some version like 8.8, fabric loom 1.14 wont work
